channel.title: Simple Suggestion
channel.description:
Just a simple suggestion to the forums. It's more than likely been suggested before, but I'll just suggest it again.
This is more for the Help Section, but adding possibly a button when the original poster has their question answered, that basically suffixes the topic title with [SOLVED] and locks it. It would also prevent gravedigging (purposeful or otherwise).
Now I know some technical challenges that may surface by adding this. Such as adding the feature only to a few boards, and then the responsibility of the OP to mark it as solved. Most people would probably just say "ok thx bai" and leave it as that.
Just a suggestion.
Support List:
[ol][li]zyle1949[/li] [li]John459[/li] [li]`SJ_[/li] [li]Loveandpower[/li] [li]Clawz fury[/li] [li]reyx7[/li][/ol]
